definition: a tract or plot of land
a company, collection, or group of persons, animals, or things : lot
examples: The whole story was a parcel of lies.
a parcel of giddy young kids

definition: a volume of a fluid (such as air) considered as a single entity within a greater volume of the same fluid
to make up into a parcel : wrap
to cover (something, such as a rope) with strips of canvas or tape
